MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G1 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9pm due to a fault on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 8:44 PM on Friday, 19 March 2021.
